text: Hagi Jehoiakimi'ma Juda vahe kinima mani'nea knafina, Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesa'a Juda vahera ha' eme huzmagatere'ne. Ana huteno Jehoiakimina atregeno agri agorga mani'ne. Hianagi 3'a kafuma evutegeno'a Jehoiakimina antahintahi'amo'a rukrahe higeno Nebukatnesana ha' renteno agri agorga omani'ne.
